summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating design, construction, maintenance, use and occupancy of buildings and amending Sections 402, 404, 505, 506, 702, 1110, 1201, 2203, 2307, 2504, 2505, 2604, 2610, 2612, 2620, 2627, 2807, 3313, 3314, 3315, 3702, 3704, 3804, 4302, 4306 & 5201 of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500).
